price: Zimwe mu ngabo z’udutsiko zizakubitirwa inshuro aha ngaha (nk’uko iz’udutsiko ari ko byazigendekeye mbere).
arabic: جُندٞ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُومٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: jundun mā hunālika mahzūmun mina al-aḥzābi
